import React from 'react'; import client1 from './images/brand1.jpg'; import client2 from './images/brand2.png'; import client4 from './images/brand3.png'; import client5 from './images/brand4.jpg'; import client6 from './images/brand5.png'; import client7 from './images/brand6.jpg'; import client8 from './images/brand7.png'; import client9 from './images/brand9.png'; import client10 from './images/brand10.png'; import client11 from './images/brand11.png'; import client12 from './images/brand12.jpg'; import client13 from './images/brand15.png'; import client14 from './images/brand16.png'; import aboutimg from './images/aboutus.png'; const About = () => { const styles = { container: { display: 'flex', justifyContent: 'center', alignItems: 'center', height: '100vh', backgroundImage: `url(${aboutimg})`, backgroundSize: 'cover', }, heading: { textAlign: 'center', color: '#fff', fontSize: '32px', fontWeight: 'bold', textShadow: '2px 2px 4px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5)', marginTop: '-70vh', }, }; return ( <>

About Us

{/* clients */}

Our Clients

{/* service */}

Services We Provide

Design and Printing

Great design and print company have two specific goals – to communicate and promote. Excellence requires complete mastery of design print craft and expertise in typography, layout, and photography. We specialize in designing and developing all types of marketing materials like corporate profiles, brochures, newsletters, flyers, insertions, annual reports, leaflets, POP materials, posters, direct mailers, hoardings and so much more.

Digital Marketing

We aim to show a resistless public presentation to the multitude that adds to the brand value of our loved clients. Our goal is to get straight to the point and cutting out everything that’s not required and coming directly to the marked communication but through a fascinating way to keep the viewers/readers/listeners focused. It is required in making an ennobling motion and striking the world, which is why a perfect digital media platform is in vast demand.

Brand Managment

We expertise and primary focus to ensure strategic clarity, build brand image, shape culture and attain sustainable market growth and competitive advantage. Corporate identity-This deals with branding through collaterals. Thus the sole purpose is to bring the brand name under public limelight.

Advertising

Advertisement, the root of all sales, product improvements and stabilizing the market value of a particular brand. Without advertising, brands would have a fewer audience, and the impact of the products would fall for backstage and thus, companies would incur massive loses if their products fail to create the mark. Thus Advertisement and Public Relations in creating, guiding and assisting a brand in its growth in the market scenario practically plays the most vital role.

Exhibition and Events

To make the grand events more pompous, a 360 coverage is provided to our clients opting for B2B, B2C meet, corporate branding task, Flags Exhibitions and Events Division offering complete turnkey solutions. Events and conference- developing themed activity, occasion, display, or exhibit to promote a product or cause of the company. Trade meets and exhibitions- gala meets. Trade fair and exhibitions for promotions of products or cause.

Public Relations

In a porous world, where news and events race across time and space, media relations ultimately helping in building relationships with the audience is the golden key. The art of communication is deep-rooted which is why we work on a simple cycle of Triple I’s i.e., Inspiration, Innovation, and Initiation. With straightforward and crisp tactics, we develop and augment the reputation of our esteemed clients with extreme proficiency. The communication message of our clients is judiciously crafted by our experienced team of communication specialist supported with in-depth research and analysis. Equipped with major communication nodes across India through a strong network of associates we understand the passion and approach with integrated solutions.

Web Designing

From the basic to advanced database sites, we promise to meet virtually every need of online communication. Web development- to deal with designing, coding and modifying websites, from layout to function and according to specifications set. Web designing – Area for production and maintenance of websites. The different areas of web design include web graphic design, interface design, authoring, user experience design; search engine optimization, navigation ergonomics, and website layout with colors, contrasts, fonts and imagery (photography) as well as icons design.

Marketing

The key to foster individuality lies in marketing. With the solemn believe that the best thing to do with the best things in life is passing them to others, Atraski serves a broad range of services to provide innovation at every step.
